Smitten Vorbos:
Oh! You came? Every time you come to my aid. Thank you very much! Now I know how to find the second key.
I managed to figure out who told you to capture Spirits. It Chertova, hero Turek Orcs. My people honor him, so the order was fulfilled immediately.
It is Chertova created a Magical Chain. He called on the help of Tetrarch, and Shamans. Together they have created two keys.
